select * from districts where deep=2 and pid=#{co};

select u.*,c.cname,m.mname,CONCAT(d.ext_name,'-',di.ext_name,'-',dis.ext_name) as arean from userstu u INNER JOIN classgrade c on u.classid=c.id INNER JOIN major m on u.majorid=m.id INNER JOIN districts d on u.idp=d.id INNER JOIN districts di on u.idc=di.id INNER JOIN districts dis on u.idt=dis.id where sname like #{name} limit #{index},10

select count(u.id) as arean from userstu u INNER JOIN classgrade c on u.classid=c.id INNER JOIN major m on u.majorid=m.id INNER JOIN districts d on u.idp=d.id INNER JOIN districts di on u.idc=di.id INNER JOIN districts dis on u.idt=dis.id where sname like #{name}

select u.*,c.cname,m.mname,CONCAT(d.ext_name,'-',di.ext_name,'-',dis.ext_name) as arean from userstu u INNER JOIN classgrade c on u.classid=c.id INNER JOIN major m on u.majorid=m.id INNER JOIN districts d on u.idp=d.id INNER JOIN districts di on u.idc=di.id INNER JOIN districts dis on u.idt=dis.id where u.id=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT into userstu(sname,classid,bornDate,nativename, majorid,phonenum,sex,idp,idc,idt,photo) VALUES(#{sname}, (SELECT id from classgrade where cname=#{classs}), #{bornDate},#{nativename},#{majorid},#{phonenum}, #{sex},#{idp},#{idc},#{idt},#{photo})
